issue.title: [GLib][Ruby] Rename GArrowSortKey::name to ::target
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14784](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14784). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because arrow::compute::SortKey::name was renamed to ::target by
528625e6ed4bf1f6540f8a410a496a14712252e7 ARROW-14074.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14784?focusedCommentId=17447623) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11748
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11748>
